hero.title: Meet Synthia ⚡
hero.subtitle: Your AI-Powered Development Assistant
hero.description: Synthia builds, deploys, and manages your projects — so you can focus on what matters. From code generation to CI/CD pipelines, she's got your back.

features.sectionSubtitle: Synthia brings powerful AI capabilities to your entire development workflow.

codeAgent.title: AI Code Agent
codeAgent.description: Submit tasks in plain English. Synthia writes the code, opens PRs, and iterates on feedback — autonomously.

cicd.title: CI/CD Management
cicd.description: Monitor builds, trigger deployments, and manage your pipelines across all repositories from one place.

tickets.title: Ticket System
tickets.description: Report bugs and request features. Synthia triages, prioritizes, and can even fix issues automatically.

multiRepo.title: Multi-Repo Management
multiRepo.description: Manage dozens of repositories at once. Track status, coordinate changes, and keep everything in sync.

collaboration.title: Team Collaboration
collaboration.description: Role-based access, shared dashboards, and real-time visibility into what Synthia is working on.

notifications.title: Real-Time Notifications
notifications.description: Stay in the loop with instant updates on builds, deployments, PR reviews, and task completions.

howItWorks.sectionSubtitle: Three simple steps to supercharge your development workflow.

step1.title: Connect Your Repos
step1.description: Link your GitHub repositories and Synthia automatically maps your projects, dependencies, and workflows.

step2.title: Submit Requests
step2.description: Describe what you need — bug fixes, new features, refactors, deployments — in plain language.

step3.title: Synthia Delivers
step3.description: She writes code, opens pull requests, runs tests, and deploys. You review and approve.

cta.title: Ready to Build Faster?
cta.description: Join the teams using Synthia to ship code at lightning speed.
